title: Did a Convicted Sex Offender Read to Children at a Houston Public Library?
subtitle: Various websites accurately reported the basic facts surrounding the conviction of Albert Alfonso Garza, who performs as "Tatiana Mala Niña."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Albert Alfonso Garza was convicted of sexually assaulting a boy in 2006, before taking part in "Drag Queen Storytime" in a Houston public library in 2017 and 2018.
